subject: [Lab 05] Q2: Closer city
content:
Q2: Closer city

Please post all questions you have below concerning Q2: Closer city in the follow-ups.

If you are stuck on this question, feel free to read through the follow-up responses to see if you can draw any ideas from them.

threads.question: How am I supposed to make lat and lon into a thing that can be one of the argument for describe?

follow-ups.feedback: Think about what `distance` takes in, then use one of the abstractions available to you

threads.question: I'm using the abstractions available to make a city object and compare the distance between that city and the two cities passed in, but I'm getting blank output. The return value for my function uses an abstraction available to return the name, but it seems to not be working.

follow-ups.feedback: Never mind, was using the wrong directory but the file had the same name.
